tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recycling_program_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_program_participants (    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    first_name VARCHAR(255),    last_name VARCHAR(255),    age INT,    city VARCHAR(255),    join_date DATE,    program_id INT );
CREATE TABLE recycling_programs (    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    program_name VARCHAR(255),    start_date DATE,    end_date DATE,    city VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE RecyclingProgramParticipants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingProgramStats (
    stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    recycling_quantity DECIMAL,
    recycling_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_participant_id FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES RecyclingProgramParticipants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingProgramLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    location_address TEXT,
    contact_person TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    sponsor VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    recycling_date DATE,
    success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE program_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE persons (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	address VARCHAR(100),
	recycling_program_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_records (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	person_id INT,
	material_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	recycle_date DATE
);
